definition: to die/to shoot dead/to reject/to fall forward/(suffix) to death

sentences.english: The nightmare is really effective, some people die a violent death mystically, some people are murdered strangely.
sentences.chinese: 噩夢果真靈驗，有人神祕暴斃，有人離奇遇害。

sentences.english: A footballer died suddenly on the field, which shocked millions of people.
sentences.chinese: 某球員暴斃球場，讓人驚訝和意外。

sentences.english: Later, you hire a consultant to analyse why the cow dropped dead.
sentences.chinese: 之後你請顧問來分析爲何母牛暴斃。

sentences.english: She was deeply shocked by her husband's sudden death.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫的暴斃使她深受打擊。

definition: to fall off or jump off a building
to die of old age/to die in one's bed at a ripe old age
to manufacture charcoal/to burn charcoal (often a reference to suicide by carbon monoxide poisoning)
to vanish/to disappear from the face of the earth
to meet violent death/to get killed
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
